00036 #include "PACC/Socket/TCPServer.hpp"
00037 #include "PACC/Util/Assert.hpp"
00038 #include <iostream>
00039 
00040 using namespace std;
00041 using namespace PACC;
00042 
00044 void Socket::ServerThread::main(void)
00045 {
00046     // process connections until thread cancellation
00047     while(!mCancel) {
00048         // acquire right to accept a connection
00049         mServer->lock();
00050         // wait either for cancellation request or pending connection 
00051         while(!mCancel && !mServer->waitForActivity(mMaxHaltDelay));
00052         if(!mCancel) {
00053             // accept pending connection
00054             int lDescriptor = mServer->accept();
00055             // release right to accept connection
00056             mServer->unlock();
00057             try {
00058                 // call server main in order to process connection
00059                 mServer->main(lDescriptor, this);
00060             } catch(const Exception& inError) {
00061                 // report any error and ignore
00062                 cerr << inError.getMessage() << endl;
00063             }
00064         } else {
00065             // release right to accept connection
00066             mServer->unlock();
00067         }
00068     }
00069 }
00070 
00077 bool Socket::ServerThread::shouldTerminate(void) const
00078 {
00079     lock();
00080     bool lResult = mCancel;
00081     unlock();
00082     return lResult;
00083 }

00090 Socket::TCPServer::TCPServer(void)
00091 {
00092     setDefaultOptions();
00093 }
00094 
00100 Socket::TCPServer::TCPServer(unsigned int inPortNumber, unsigned int inMinPending)
00101 {
00102     setDefaultOptions();
00103     Port::bind(inPortNumber);
00104     Port::listen(inMinPending);
00105 }
00106 
00121 Socket::TCPServer::~TCPServer(void)
00122 {
00123     // delete every thread after making sure that they have stopped running
00124     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < mThreadPool.size(); ++i) {
00125         PACC_AssertM(!mThreadPool[i]->isRunning(), "Destructor called without first halting the server and waiting for the threads to terminate. Please correct the situation because it is potentially very hazardous!");
00126         delete mThreadPool[i];
00127     }
00128     mThreadPool.clear();
00129 }
00130 
00136 void Socket::TCPServer::halt(void)
00137 {
00138     // request cancellation for all threads
00139     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < mThreadPool.size(); ++i) {
00140         mThreadPool[i]->lock();
00141         mThreadPool[i]->cancel();
00142         mThreadPool[i]->unlock();
00143     }
00144 }
00145 
00154 void Socket::TCPServer::setDefaultOptions()
00155 {
00156     setSockOpt(eReuseAddress, true);
00157     setSockOpt(eLinger, 10);
00158 }
00159 
00167 void Socket::TCPServer::run(unsigned int inThreads, double inMaxHaltDelay)
00168 {
00169     // allocate new threads
00170     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < inThreads; ++i) {
00171         ServerThread* lThread = new ServerThread(this, inMaxHaltDelay);
00172         mThreadPool.push_back(lThread);
00173     }
00174 }
00175 
00179 void Socket::TCPServer::wait(void)
00180 {
00181     // wait for the termination of every server thread
00182     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < mThreadPool.size(); ++i) {
00183         // do not wait for one self!
00184         if(!mThreadPool[i]->isSelf()) mThreadPool[i]->wait(true);
00185     }
00186 }
